trans-unit.source: Copies one or more files.
Parameters
The source path of the file(s) to copy. (* and ? wildcards accepted - See Remarks)

seg-source.mrk: The source path of the file(s) to copy.

target.mrk: The source path of the file(s) to copy.

trans-unit.source: The destination path of the copied file(s).

seg-source.mrk: The destination path of the copied file(s).

target.mrk: The destination path of the copied file(s).

trans-unit.source: [optional] this flag determines whether to overwrite files if they already exist.

seg-source.mrk: this flag determines whether to overwrite files if they already exist.

target.mrk: this flag determines whether to overwrite files if they already exist.

trans-unit.source: Can be a combination of the following:

seg-source.mrk: Can be a combination of the following:

target.mrk: Can be a combination of the following:

trans-unit.source: $FC_NOOVERWRITE (0) = (default) do not overwrite existing files
$FC_OVERWRITE (1) = overwrite existing files
$FC_CREATEPATH (8) = Create destination directory structure if it doesn't exist (See Remarks).

seg-source.mrk: $FC_CREATEPATH (8) = Create destination directory structure if it doesn't exist (See Remarks).

target.mrk: $FC_CREATEPATH (8) = Create destination directory structure if it doesn't exist (See Remarks).

trans-unit.source: Constants are defined in FileConstants.au3.
Return Value
Remarks
See FileFindFirstFile() for a discussion about wildcards.

seg-source.mrk: See FileFindFirstFile() for a discussion about wildcards.

target.mrk: See FileFindFirstFile() for a discussion about wildcards.

trans-unit.source: The destination directory must already exist, except using with flag value $FC_CREATEPATH (8).

seg-source.mrk: The destination directory must already exist, except using with flag value $FC_CREATEPATH (8).

target.mrk: The destination directory must already exist, except using with flag value $FC_CREATEPATH (8).

trans-unit.source: For instance the combined flag $FC_OVERWRITE (1) + $FC_CREATEPATH (8) overwrites the target file and pre-checks for the destination directory structure and if it doesn't exist creates it automatically.

seg-source.mrk: For instance the combined flag $FC_OVERWRITE (1) + $FC_CREATEPATH (8) overwrites the target file and pre-checks for the destination directory structure and if it doesn't exist creates it automatically.

target.mrk: For instance the combined flag $FC_OVERWRITE (1) + $FC_CREATEPATH (8) overwrites the target file and pre-checks for the destination directory structure and if it doesn't exist creates it automatically.

trans-unit.source: Some file attributes can make the overwriting impossible, if this is the case look at FileSetAttrib() to change the attributes of a file.

seg-source.mrk: Some file attributes can make the overwriting impossible, if this is the case look at FileSetAttrib() to change the attributes of a file.

target.mrk: Some file attributes can make the overwriting impossible, if this is the case look at FileSetAttrib() to change the attributes of a file.

Example
Create a constant variable in Local scope of the filepath that will be read/written to.

seg-source.mrk: Create a constant variable in Local scope of the filepath that will be read/written to.

target.mrk: Create a constant variable in Local scope of the filepath that will be read/written to.

trans-unit.source: Create a temporary file to copy.

seg-source.mrk: Create a temporary file to copy.

target.mrk: Create a temporary file to copy.

seg-source.mrk: This is an example of using FileCopy.

target.mrk: This is an example of using FileCopy.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred whilst writing the temporary file.

seg-source.mrk: An error occurred whilst writing the temporary file.

target.mrk: An error occurred whilst writing the temporary file.

trans-unit.source: Copy Au3 files in the temporary directory to a new folder/directory called Au3Files.

seg-source.mrk: Copy Au3 files in the temporary directory to a new folder/directory called Au3Files.

target.mrk: Copy Au3 files in the temporary directory to a new folder/directory called Au3Files.

trans-unit.source: \Au3Files\
Display the temporary directory.
